<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">[Hunter's Luck](/Spells.aspx?ID=772)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 235 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Free Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about a creature, but you haven't rolled yet.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You have a preternatural ability to remember details about your foes. Roll the triggering check twice and use the better result.
name: Hunter's Luck
